alert.note: Alert for Hitchcock; Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 9:43PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Red Willow and northeastern Hitchcock Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 942 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles east of Palisade, or 9 miles south of Hayes Center, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... McCook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for southwestern Nebraska.
